Key Match Events: England win by 10 wickets and with 24 balls to spare - Buttler seals victory with a six
Buttler (80) and Hales (86) chase down 169 in style - England hit 10 sixes
Late hitting from Hardik (63 off 33) propels India to 168-6
Kohli anchors India with 50 off 40 balls
India slip to 75-3 after losing Rohit and Suryakumar in quick succession
Post-Match Reflections: Martin Tooth: That is a sensational performance by England. To hit 170 with 4 overs to spare and no wickets down, against India. Wow. Peaking at the right time again, a la 2019?

Ravi Bopara: England were fantastic. They are setting the bar and the trend for T20 cricket. They come out and play their shots, not just in international cricket but in domestic cricket too. They are trying to get 60-70 off the first six overs, not just 45.
